                                         java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> fragments,
                                         boolean forceChoice)
                                  throws UndoException
        Description copied from interface: ActionDataSource
        Used when requesting which specif effect to used of a weapon.
        Specified by:
        requestFragment in interface ActionDataSource
        Overrides:
        requestFragment in class TurnDataSourceImpl
        Parameters:
        cardID - weaponID
        fragments - list of the fragments ids
        forceChoice - boolean used to compel to choose, effectively looping until a valid input is received.
        Returns:
        int corresponding to the fragment chosen
        Throws:
        UndoException - to allow Undo
